name: Onion Shortcake
author: Katie F
summary: This is a recipe I got from my mom. Not sure where she got it but it's so good! It's a mix of cornbread, onions, sour cream, and cheese, with a little bit of dill and hot sauce if you feel like it.
ingredients: 1 (8.5 ounce) package corn muffin mix (such as Jiffy®)
1 large sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced
1 teaspoon hot sauce, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Blend corn muffin mix with creamed corn, milk, and egg
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
Mix onion with sour cream, 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, hot sauce, and dill
Pour onion mixture into the baking pan and spread carefully over the cornbread layer with a spatula
Sprinkle remaining Cheddar cheese on top
Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes
